00018     SARSAController::SARSAController(Approximator* approx, Policy* policy, double tdDiscount) : ValueController(approx) {
00019 
00020         this->policy = policy;
00021         this->tdDiscount = tdDiscount;
00022         lastRew = 0;
00023         dist.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00024         lastDist.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00025

00042     void SARSAController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action,  bool computeGrad) {
00043 
00044         assert(action.size() == 1);
00045 
00046         // Learn by experience?
00047         this->computeGrad = computeGrad;
00048 
00049 
00050         // Get state-action values for this state
00051         approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00052 
00053 
00054         // Get next action according to policy
00055         policy->getAction(dist, action, obs);
00056 
00057         if (computeGrad) {
00058             // Temporal difference error calculation
00059             if (obs.getSteps() <= 1)
00060                 error = 0.0;
00061             else {
00062 
00063                 // Get new value estimate of previous state
00064                 approx->doApprox(lastObs, lastDist);
00065                 
00066                 // Compute td error
00067                 error = lastRew + tdDiscount * dist((int)action[0]) - lastDist[lastAct];
00068                 
00069                 //cout<<"lastRew="<<lastRew<<" tddiscount="<<tdDiscount<<" lambda="<<lambda<<" lastAct="<<lastAct<<" action[0]="<<action[0]<<" lastDist="<<lastDist<<" dist="<<dist<<" error="<<error<<endl;
00070             }
00071         }
00072     
00073         // Recall last action and observation
00074         lastAct = (int)action[0];
00075         lastObs = obs;
00076     }
00077 
00078 
00082     void SARSAController::discountTrace() {
00083         if (computeGrad) {
00084             approx->discountTrace();
00085             dist.clear();
00086             dist[lastAct] = 1.0;
00087             approx->feedbackGrad(lastObs, dist);
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091 
00092     void SARSAController::instantStep(Vector& reward) {
00093         if (computeGrad) {
00094             lastRew = reward[0];
00095             approx->instantStep(error);
00096         }
00097     }
00098 
00099     void SARSAController::setDiscount(double lambda) {
00100         this->lambda = lambda;
00101         approx->setDiscount(tdDiscount*lambda);
00102     }
